Hash.to_url_params (nested)

Google couldnâ€™t find me a good one. So I made this one:

Liquid error: undefined method `join’ for #

Will transform:

Liquid error: undefined method `join’ for “\n {:person =>{:name => ‘Bobby’, :age=>’28’}}\n”:String

Into:

Liquid error: undefined method `join’ for \n person[name]=Bobby&person[age]=28\n
